DataElement.preferredName: Study Site Stop Clinical Study Participation Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine the date on which a facility that conducts study/protocol activities ceased to take part in a study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Site Stop Clinical Study Participation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._Put an end to a state or an activity._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._The act of taking part in an activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

Concepts.definition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

Property.preferredDefinition: Put an end to a state or an activity.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:The act of taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Put an end to a state or an activity.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
